title: Halloween Skins 2015
body: Will there be Halloween skins this year?

replies.body: Disappointing.
Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu are the seasonal skins.
will the {{champion:120}} skin come back?
Yet its Halloween and they are no where to be seen. You guys really dropped the ball this year. People aren't excited for Halloween skins on 11/1.

> [{quoted}](name=Peridition,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=00010007,timestamp=2015-10-31T14:00:43.944+0000)
>
> Yet its Halloween and they are no where to be seen. You guys really dropped the ball this year. People aren't excited for Halloween skins on 11/1.

^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-23T20:42:06.972+0000)
>
> Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu are the seasonal skins.

Will legacy skins be on sale during a Harrowing event? :)
will {{champion:63}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:4}}  skins come back?

> [{quoted}](name=TDS Rekt,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2015-10-27T14:04:21.955+0000)
>
> will {{champion:63}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:4}}  skins come back?

I'd REALLYYYY like to know the answer to this question.
Will the halloween legacy skins be availalbe to purchase soon?
They'll be available later this patch!

do you have any idea how long the legacy skins and the new ones will be out before they leave because i have a work schedule that works 2 workweeks at a time so it starts on the 4th and ends on the 11th will i be able to purchase the skins either before or after that time frame?
Ok, ALL harrowing crap( including new skins 2k15) will be avaliable on harrowing. except for the limited edition ones. but honestly i dont think there are any harrowing limited edition skins.
What about a Red Riding Hood Kindred skin?

They aren't going to bring back just one or two Halloween skins.. You should be asking are you guys going to be releasing previous Halloween skins this Halloween? You've done it every year if I'm correct, so why not this year? I'm sure we all want an answer to this question.
Legacy skins will be making their way back to the store later this patch. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=000100050000,timestamp=2015-11-02T18:41:57.271+0000)
>
> Legacy skins will be making their way back to the store later this patch. :]

Thank you so much, atleast u cared and answered us, u dunno how many days i entered this site to find an answer, god bless u <3
Today is the Halloween, where are the skins - -.....? 0 event this year? OMG...
Thanks for releasing the seasonal skin on Halloween trash riot

> [{quoted}](name=8MYCHICKEN,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=00010009,timestamp=2015-11-01T01:56:43.862+0000)
>
> Thanks for releasing the seasonal skin on Halloween trash riot
They actually will ! I'm so glad we were so patience and they're finally COMING :D <3 
https://twitter.com/RiotKateyKhaos?lang=en
Katey. ‏@RiotKateyKhaos
[UPDATE] There will be legacy skins coming back when the Zombie/Slayer skins come out later this patch (5.21)!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-23T20:42:06.972+0000)
>
> Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu are the seasonal skins.

everyone report this guy for NOT ANSWERING THE QUESTION!!!! reported you peasant.
you got it. zombie nunu, jinx and pantheon slayer. nunu is good the other two are horrible.

> [{quoted}](name=Horrorshow,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-23T20:34:07.736+0000)
>
> you got it. zombie nunu, jinx and pantheon slayer. nunu is good the other two are horrible.

Pantheon is pretty decent.

Neither of them are bad. I just think they could have given us something we wanted and did more for the season. Slayer Jinx and Pantheon seem like they can come out at any time of the year and have no problems. Necromancer Azir or Trick or Treat Bard would have been better choices. It seems like a waste of space for the slayer skins. Not a big deal. I won't be purchasing the skins or participating in the event . . . . this year the Harrowing and skins are a BIG disappointment to many of us.

> [{quoted}](name=Horrorshow,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-23T20:46:08.246+0000)
>
> Neither of them are bad. I just think they could have given us something we wanted and did more for the season. Slayer Jinx and Pantheon seem like they can come out at any time of the year and have no problems. Necromancer Azir or Trick or Treat Bard would have been better choices. It seems like a waste of space for the slayer skins. Not a big deal. I won't be purchasing the skins or participating in the event . . . . this year the Harrowing and skins are a BIG disappointment to many of us.

I think they did it wrong. The skins aren't bad but they should have added more skins and some kind of zombie event. Like one of the teams being zzombies that slowly corrupts the battlefeild making it empower them so the slayers have to win fast. This would have made the slayer skins really cool and memorable. Instead they just look like not that amazing borderland characters.

> [{quoted}](name=Horrorshow,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-23T20:34:07.736+0000)
>
> you got it. zombie nunu, jinx and pantheon slayer. nunu is good the other two are horrible.

Slayer jinx is so good

> [{quoted}](name=AimiM,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0eTd1pRk,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-23T20:27:53.314+0000)
>
> Will there be Halloween skins this year?

Soooo...... ummm... tomorrow is Halloween, Rito. Umm... WHERE THE FCK ARE THE HALLOWEEN SKINS? HELLO RITO??? HEELLLOOOO? ANYONE WORKING THERE STILL?
It's halloween and they haven't even release the skins yet.

Will the legacy skins be back in the shop for a limited time again? That's all I really care about, and I haven't seen anything about it even though that's a big part of why I'm looking forward to the Harrowing.
Yup! Legacy skins will be coming back later this patch - 5.21! :]
wath day does it start??
i want to know too :(

alright this is fncking dumb. why the hell hasnt riot released the halloween skins yet???? everyone who has been around says the shit was sposed to be released a week ago... what the fudge is this nonsense? been up 42 hours straight now waiting for the release and STILL NOTHInG!!!!! are we working on china time now riot? i get it that you guys sold your souls to china, but ffs those people dont celebrate halloween!!!!! COME ON RIOT GET YOUR SHIT TOGETHER!!!! RELEASE THE DAMN SKINS!!!!
No skin is worth putting your health at risk, please get some sleep.
Korea get it right
When is it coming out apparently. I'm mostly looking forward with the old legacy skins.

Well. It's officially no longer Halloween and still no Slayer skins. Hoping that doesn't mean they're not seasonal and that they're just new skins until further notice. I'm somewhat disappointed. Really not looking forward to Halloween skins in November. But hey, beggars can't be choosers I guess.
halloween skins? coming back?
I could understand waiting for the new skins to come out, but are they really not going to put the legacy skins on sale for Halloween? That's incredibly disappointing.
Legacy skins will be available later this patch.

The original skins did not come this year or what? :( i have already buy 5725 rp i want my money back.
{{item:3023}} sad Helloween everybody.
Hiya! If you're referring to legacy skins, they will be coming back later this patch.
how long can we buy halloween skins

They're out now but how long will they be out for? 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Better put Haunted Maokai back

i sent riot a email with support and they said (I’m sorry, but I can’t provide any information beyond the announcement of any new or upcoming content or promotions. Anything we haven’t officially released is still subject to change, so we try not to discuss too many details)
and yet no skins....{{champion:56}}

So where are these skins? I started playing League in June so I was really excited for my first Halloween and I really didn't know what to expect. Well, it's the day after Halloween and still nothing? I'm a {{champion:222}} main and I really wanted to get the Slayer Jinx skin, but now I'm considering not getting it. I also wanted to get a couple of the legacy skins too, but I guess that's not happening either. Thanks Rito for not letting me have my first Halloween with you. :(
Will there bee the halloween skins this year? if yes, when do they come?!?!

Soon. Try waiting. Worlds just ended.
